name: VehicleWater
description: VehicleWater are entities which Characters can possesses and drive over the water with dynamic physics.

functions.name: SetEngineOffset
functions.description: Sets the relative location of the Engine (where the Physics Thruster, sounds and effects are attached)
functions.description_long: Sets the relative location of the Engine (where the Physics Thruster, sounds and effects are attached). Default is Vector(-200, 0, 0)

functions.name: SetThrustStrength
functions.description: Sets the force of the Engine/Thruster
functions.description_long: Sets the force of the Engine/Thruster. Default is 1000
